title: MBMBaM 583: Soccertes
description:
We thought everyone was agreed that all of October is time for dressing in costume and eating scary donuts that are not actually that scary. But it turns out there are differing opinions about this. Good thing we’ve got Mr. Halloween himself, Joseph Fink to advise us. The King of Horror. The Duke of Doom. The Sultan of Scares.

Suggested talking points: Mr. Zucker’s Cooltime Internet, Iconic Eric Pervert Mustache, Spike this Ball, The Shared Finkoverse, Mr. Bone Clown Scare Gobblers

Support AAPI communities and those affected by anti-Asian violence: https://www.gofundme.com/c/act/stop-aapi-hate 

For resources on anti-racism and fighting police violence: https://blacklivesmatters.carrd.co/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Travis McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy)
